 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּשָׂה‎</span>] **verb** ==be sated, gorged== ==with food== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be filled with food***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***kissatum, sustenance, provender***</u></abbr>, ***food***, Zephnpf<sup>BAS i. 503</sup>); — only **Qal** ***Perfect*** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁמַנְתָּ עָבִיתָ כָּשִׂיתָ‎</span> [[Deut.32.15|Deut 32:15]] ***thou grewest fat, becamest thick, wast gorged !*** figurative of Israel as fat beast (compare [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]). <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֻּשִׁיִּים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֻּשִׁית‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כּוּשִׁי‎</span>.
